commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Draisaitl laying the body early. He just hammered Forsling in the corner.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: Setting the tone physically, letting the Panthers know they're in for a battle tonight.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: You love to see that intensity early in the game, especially in a matchup like this.
